policy.specials:
look and lease : 1/2 deposit and 1/2 application fee $300-$500 off 1st month on select units
3% Preferred employer discount.

rating.title: This place is awful
rating.description: The walls and ceiling in these apartments are paper thin. I can hear the lady next door blabbing away on her phone, and the guy upstairs taking a leak. It's crazy, and not worth the money at all. The leasing office is useless and does nothing to abate the situation,

rating.title: No, no, and no!
rating.description: 1.) When we first moved in, there was a miscommunication on one of the staffers. We were told to make our first rent payment via check, but come to find out, we had to have a cashiers check, which the management FAILED to tell us.2.) I have lived at Lansbrook

rating.title: Good place to live
rating.description: Settler's Gate has been a good place to reside. The office staff have been responsive and understanding on all my issues, and have provided good hours and availability. Johnny, one of the managers, in particular has been very helpful in helping me resolve maintenance issues. Johnny has a thorough understanding

rating.title: Management is awful!
rating.description: My partner and I have been at Settlers Gate since April and have made, on average, 5 calls per month regarding our neighbors upstairs who are unusually loud until midnight or later. The courtesy officer for after hours issues is useless, their supposed noise ordinance is a farce, and management

rating.title: LEASING OFFICE IS A JOKE!!

rating.title: Years at the Gate
rating.description: I've love the area, the schools have been great for my daughters. But the number one problem has been the mangement. rating.title: NO! NO! NO! Don't move here!

rating.title: I miss this place.....
rating.description: I recently moved into a new apartment in Irving so I could live closer to work. I realized how good I had it at Settler's Gate! My husband and I lived there for over a year and a half, and never had any problems. Any complaints I had, they were

rating.title: settlersgatesucks@yahoomail.com, I think this says it all.
rating.description: If you like to pay your rent early and never late don't fear you will still get an eviction notice because they don't know how to add. You will have to show them proof you paid it because Carmen Suggs (Regional Vice President) only cares about your $$money$$. We tried

rating.title: VERY UNPROFESSIONAL, RUDE, AND NEEDS TO BE FIRED!!!
rating.description: If you want to be able to pay your rent and be able to work at the same time, dont count on living here. They block off the night drop box and you have to hand deliver your rent to them. If you actually work and have a job this

rating.title: STAY AWAY FROM THIS PLACE
rating.description: BEFORE YOU MOVE INTO THIS HELL, JUST READ ALL THESE REVIEWS AND YES DO BELEIVE, THEY ARE ALL CORRECT.THESE PEOPLE WILL DO ANYTHING TO GET YOU IN, AFTER THAT IT IS DIFFERENT STORY. I DON'T WANT TO TALK ABOUT ALL MY HORIBLE EXPERIANCES I HAVE WITH THEM, AND YES I

rating.title: An apartment yes, Luxury it's a joke. Cheap run down apartment in a nice package.
rating.description: I moved here from Virginia, I saw the outside and was sold. The show apartment was nice. (becuase it has never been lived in) Curb appeal was great until I got my keys and went inside. Dirty carpets, linoleum floors which are scratched, walls which have been painted over several

rating.title: Horrible place to live
rating.description: Imagine this, water, dripping out of your ceiling/wall. Management, not in a big hurry to care. Damage done to furniture, who cares. Fans to dry the carpet, pewew!! Now comes the repairs, I can see every seam that was repaired, and the paint doesn't match. Rude staff. Can't wait to

rating.title: Save yourself the headache
rating.description: We lived there for 3 years. then we bought a house, so we needed additional two months, and we made a deal with one of the leasing agent to pay the full price for the apt without additional fees. The first bill came and it was ok, but two day later

rating.title: I LIVE IN HELL!!!
rating.description: DONT LIVE HERE! MANAGEMENT/MAINTENECE IS HORRIBLE. PLEASE LISTEN TO EVERYONE WHEN WE SAY THIS IS A BAD PLACE TO LIVE. PAY A LITTLE MORE MONEY A MONTH AND LIVE SOMEWHERE ELSE. TRUST ME!

rating.title: RANKS LOW ON MY LIST OF EXPECTATIONS!
rating.description:
I am one that doesn't complain much at all. I rank this complex one of the worst complexs I have lived in. I could complain about my personal experiences but I wont. I will give you facts.
* I can lay in my bed in a 1 bedroom, and hear the

rating.title: This place will deceive you and so will the office staff.
rating.description: I lived here for only 8 months and about to move out soon, thank god. I have lived in apt's for most my life and this was the worst experience ever. The staff seems friendly, nice, and attentive ofcourse at first glance when they are giving you papers to sign

rating.title: Cant Wait To Move!! Hate this place
rating.description: I moved to this complex thinking it was a luxory apartment. It was close to job and nice community. Nothing but problems from the time we moved in. Maintenance issues are ongoing, never repaired completely.. temporary fix then same issue within weeks. Manangement is very rude. Had issue where son

rating.title: A bunch of con artists
rating.description: Applied for a unit was denied. No big deal. Wrote two checks. One for application fee the other for a deposit. Was denied so obviouly the app fee would still apply but they took my 250 down payment (overdrafted my account) Then said I would have to call corporate to

rating.title: Not so luxury!!
rating.description: I USED to live at this complex, and had some of the same problems. Along with people speeding and peeling out through the complex that resulted in two accidents (in one a BMW was totaled). With a playground off the main entranceway, it is just asking for kids to get

rating.title: Don't live here...
rating.description: I unfortunately am still living here until my lease is up as I cannot afford to pay the cost to break the lease. I hate it here. I have lived in apartments before and never had to deal with what I do. This place is so loud to live and

rating.title: Not tenant friendly
rating.description: I am in the process of moving OUT of Settler's Gate apartments. I have lived in Settler's Gate since I moved to Texas in 2001. They were just like any other apartment complex until they were bought out by Sherman Residential sometime in 2004. Since then I have experienced the

rating.title: $10,0000.00 owed, ha
rating.description: I lived there for 1 yr, lost my job, had to move out, broke lease, okay I know I screwed up, but they are trying to say I owe them $10,000.00. HA, BIG JOKE!!! IMPOSSIBLE IMPOSSIBLE, IMPOSSIBLE!! THEY ARE IDIOTS, AND THE MANAGER BITCH IS COMPLETLEY RUDE AND IMMATURETOLD HER

rating.title: ANTS AND GREEN POOLS
rating.description: AS FAR AS i AM CONSIDERED THERE IS NO MANAGEMENT HERE . FIRE YES FIRE ANTS ALL OVER MY PLACE!!! DISGUSTING. 2 OF THE 3 WATER FACILITIES ARE UNSWIMABLE

rating.title: Horrible Management
rating.description: Sherman Residential took over this property a few months ago and remodeled the whole property. Looks like project housing now. And these are supposed to be luxury apartments! They moved in a bunch of irresponsible teenagers and some ghetto fabulous from Oak Cliff and the place just went to hell.

rating.title: So far horrible...
rating.description: I have lived here since 4/23/2006 and it has been a problem ever since. My apartment was not made ready for me to move in when I told them that I was moving in OVER a month before. It was not painted, the carpet was not cleaned, there were cracks

rating.title: I don't get it
rating.description: i read most of the reviews and from what i saw most of the complaints seem to be caused by the people that were renting not the management. now i can say that management isn't always great from what i've exprienced so far but what do you expect. Find me

rating.title: FINALLY about to move!!!
rating.description: After a LONG year of living here I am more than ready to get out of here. I was so excited at first, but after having my car towed, noise violations when only 2 people were over, and issues with the office staff I am counting down the days until

rating.title: it may get better???
rating.description: I've lived here for 1.5 years and am very dissatisfied with Settler's Gate. I won't go into a long story about my situation, but I will say this, I paid a HEFTY sum to down size from a large apartment to a small apartment! When I moved into the larger

rating.title: wonder how its doing now that the DEVIL has left
rating.description: So I guess in the past 4 months alot has happened-doesnt that tell you something about how apts are doing when they keep changing staff- I worked there for like 3 wks and the pyscho manager was having a SKITZO week, then the nasty ass guy in the office David

rating.title: I don't even live here!!!
rating.description: First of all, I've never lived at Settler's Gate, I made the HUGE mistake of going to look at their apts. They asked for a check to hold an apartment when one became available. They were running a special where there was NO application fee. Okay, I'll bite, so I

rating.title: want to sleep?
rating.description: Want to sleep? dont move here! THIN WALLS! Falling apart. Shaddy materials and workmanship. Foundation a seroious promblem. TERRIBLE MANAGER! SHE SIT ON HER THRONE AND THAT'S ALL SHE DOES.

rating.title: Puzzled
rating.description: I am a new resident here so I may not be the most knowledgable person to speak about the the complex, but I know that when I first applied to live here I was extrememly nervous. You could tell that no one on the staff was wanting to be there.

rating.title: Great Property Terrible Management
rating.description:
I lived here for three years and can say that things have certainly changed. Here are the pros and cons. You decide if it's worth the move or not.
PROS: The one bedrooms are cozy w/oversized windows in living and bedroom. Good size kitchen with built in computer desk. Nice size storage.
Maintenance

rating.title: not too bad but bad managment and little overpriced
rating.description: I have been living here for the last one year and seen the management change a few times. The present management is rude and do not even entertain simple requests as renewing our lease. We have always paid our rent on time so that was not a problem but had

rating.title: Its OK
rating.description: The only problem I have with the apartments is that the gates are always broken, and the gate opener hardley ever works. Never really had to deal with the management crew unless I am picking up packages, but they seem fairly nice

rating.title: WHAT A JOKE!!! PLEASE DO NOT MOVE HERE!!
rating.description: I have been living here for almost 10 months and the management has changed 3 times, there are incompetant, and never want to help!! We had a problem with our heater and they told US to clean it out!!! As if we have a 6 foot ladder in our closet

rating.title: Just a place to live...
rating.description: I have lived here for 2 years now and wouldn't think of moving, it's close to work.The old Management company was alright with the exception of waiting on microwave parts!! The new one seems to have it's quirks but i haven't run into any problems yet.The office has a cute

rating.title: Wow! What a mess....so glad I've left this property.
rating.description: I lived there for 3 1/2 years. The other mgt company was better than who is there now. BIG warning for pet ownersI found out the hard way - if you own a pet, be prepared to fork over money for new carpet for ANY stains. They will claim that

rating.title: This place sucks something fierce.
rating.description: This place is terrible, and I've seen it decline further since the new management company has been around. New paint, trees, etc doesn't matter if you can't get the service you deserve and gates that never function. After being here since 2003, rent has increased time after time, not sure

rating.title: very pleased
rating.description:
I've lived here for 2 yrs. and been very pleased with the apt., the management, the maintenance, and the facilities (including upkeep and improvements.)
I've never had a problem that wasn't resolved quickly and I appreciate the professional attitude of the staff.
They've also continued to update and improve the buildings

rating.title: Enjoyable experience
rating.description: My lease ended 8/31/05. I was only moving because I decided to build a house. When I found out my house was not ready, I had to call the office & ask for more time. They stated that my apartment had already been leased, but to give them some time

rating.title: Nightmare
rating.description:
These are the rudest people managing this complex, I've ever encountered.
The staff tried once to force themselves into my apt and take my tv, because my check for rent was lost at their office and they thought I didn't pay it. This after only 2 days late.
This is only one

rating.title: rude
rating.description: I have never been to an apartment complex where the manager is so rude. The person who leased us the apartment was very nice. When I went in to pick up the keys I saw the manager walk by me, she had a scowl on her face and did not

rating.title: Awful experience
rating.description: We moved to Settlers Gate after selling our home. We were in the process of building a new home and needed somewhere to stay in transition for approximately 4 to 5 months. At first we were impressed and it seemed everyone was very nice and ready to assist. As we

rating.title: criminals posing as managers.....
rating.description: We recently lived at Settlers Gate for 18 months. Then, we bought a house. They told us we could be out a month early on our lease, then we changed our mind and wanted to stay the last month to finish out lease out and we were told that it

rating.title: Rent is too high for what you get.
rating.description: In one word, poor management.

rating.title: You can probably do better
rating.description: I lived in this community for a little over a year, and it was remarkably ok. The biggest problems I encountered were the amount of dog crap on the grounds and the horrible management. The place absolutely reaked of dog crap when the wind blew the right way. The management

rating.title: Same Old Same old
rating.description: Looks like old habits die hard. Too bad after all this time, management still cannot get it right. Why dont you try learning something from your surrounding competiton and then you might be on the right track. Pull it outta your butt and put it back on your shoulders!

rating.title: new management blows!!!
rating.description: New management is a joke. Only concerned about filing the place up. I feel sorry for the people in maintenance.
